Title: Embellished Top Evening Dress

----

Sku: 7915

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 4, 8, 6, 12, 10

----

Colors: pink, champagne

----

Category: mob

----

Featured-image: 7915-champagne-embellished-top-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Sparkling mermaid gown with lace overlay. The high neckline sweeps into a mock off the shoulder look. The bust is covered in shimmering jewels that fall away and cascade into the body of the dress. The back of the gown has a sheer panel that is dotted with dazzling beads.
